page.title: 10HEAD VERGER,DURHAM CATHEDRAL
page.content: Mr.Owen Rees' job is one of the busiest in the Cathedral.He is the { {Public Relations Officer}caring for the welfare of the visitors.The Vergers care for school parties, services,concerts and the daily routine of the Cathedral.This job can be very hectic and with about{500,000} visitors per annum,these are mainly in the summer months,it can be very tiring and you can become overworked so his days off when he takes his Spaniels for a walk or goes to Berwick on Tweed and his four weeks holiday are a just reward. There are times when the Cathedral becomes overcrowded.Once British Rail offered cheap tickets to pensioners and this brought the crowds in.{Bishop {David Jenkins}has also brought a lot of publicity to the diocese.This means that Mr.Rees often has to say "stop".
